description: Lists all members within a collaboration.

parameters.name: collaborationIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the collaboration in which the members are listed.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used to fetch the next set of results.

nested_items.name: memberSummaries
nested_items.description: The list of members returned by the ListMembers operation.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The identifier used to reference members of the collaboration. Currently only supports Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the member.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The member's display name.

nested_items.name: abilities
nested_items.description: The abilities granted to the collaboration member.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: mlAbilities
nested_items.description: Provides a summary of the ML abilities for the collaboration member.

nested_items.name: customMLMemberAbilities
nested_items.description: The custom ML member abilities for a collaboration member.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time when the member was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The time the member metadata was last updated.

nested_items.name: membershipId
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the member's associated membership, if present.

nested_items.name: membershipArn
nested_items.description: The unique ARN for the member's associated membership, if present.

nested_items.name: paymentConfiguration
nested_items.description: The collaboration member's payment responsibilities set by the collaboration creator.

nested_items.name: queryCompute
nested_items.description: The collaboration member's payment responsibilities set by the collaboration creator for query compute costs.

nested_items.name: isResponsible
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the collaboration creator has configured the collaboration member to pay for query compute costs ( TRUE) or has not configured the collaboration member to pay for query compute costs ( FALSE).

nested_items.name: machineLearning
nested_items.description: An object representing the collaboration member's machine learning payment responsibilities set by the collaboration creator.

nested_items.name: modelTraining
nested_items.description: The payment responsibilities accepted by the member for model training.

nested_items.name: isResponsible
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the collaboration creator has configured the collaboration member to pay for model training costs ( TRUE) or has not configured the collaboration member to pay for model training costs ( FALSE).

nested_items.name: modelInference
nested_items.description: The payment responsibilities accepted by the member for model inference.

nested_items.name: isResponsible
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the collaboration creator has configured the collaboration member to pay for model inference costs ( TRUE) or has not configured the collaboration member to pay for model inference costs ( FALSE).

nested_items.name: jobCompute
nested_items.description: The compute configuration for the job.

nested_items.name: isResponsible
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the collaboration creator has configured the collaboration member to pay for query and job compute costs ( TRUE) or has not configured the collaboration member to pay for query and job compute costs ( FALSE).
